title: What are the benefits of spoken word poetry? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can express the meaning of your words better through your voice. (Written poetry, in contrast, does not allow you to do that).You gain confidence. Both in yourself and in your words.You overcome your fear of public speaking (if ever you have that fear).You come out to the world. Your audience can finally see the face behind your poetry.You may feel liberated. Speaking your feelings/poetry brings you much more relief than just writing them down.

While studying and writing any poetry helps students develop literacy skills spoken word also helps students build social and emotional skill sets including self awareness communication and self confidence.
